about_the_game:
UI Icon Set is an RPG Maker official collection of icons made in pixel art.

With "UI Icon Set", you have access to 126 high-quality pixel art UI sprites depicting:

-Status effects

-Attribute changes

-Spell elements

-Buffs and debuffs

-Weapon and armor types

-Menu categories

-Battle commands

They are most suitable as icons for menus, but can be used as item drops or whatever you desire to use them for.

■Highly detailed and vibrant UI icon pixel art sprites hand-drawn in 16x16px to give the feel of classic retro video games, then up-scaled pixel-perfect to 32x32px to fit usage in RPG Maker games.

■Contains groups of icons depicting: status effects, spell elements, buffs/debuffs, weapon/armor types, menu categories, and battle commands.

■Use as icons for menus, item drops from enemies, props for scenes, or whatever you can think of!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Includes:

1.)    Iconset.png

2.)    Icons_UI_drops.png

3.)    Individual Sprites folder

　a.       Drops folder: 126 UI icons as drops

　b.      UI Icons folder: 126 UI icons

4.)    Raw Files folder containing all unscaled sprites

　a.       Icons_UI.png

　b.      icons_UI_raw_drops.png

　c.       icons_UI Individual folder: 126 UI icons

　d.      Individual Drops Icons folder: 126 UI icons as drops

5.)    icons_UI.gal (Graphics Gale application file)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

・Rights must be indicated when using assets.

・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
